newsitem.title: POLAND: Zloty falls half point vs basket, future hazy.
newsitem.headline: Zloty falls half point vs basket, future hazy.

text.p: 1115 GMT - The Polish zloty weakened half a percent against the currency basket by mid-day Monday to 0.72/0.41 pct from the trading band centre vs opening's 1.05/0.97 pct in volatile trade marred by one figure spreads.
* It was at 3.2880/980 to the dollar, down from 3.2720/60 at 0700 GMT and at 1.8835/95 to the mark, down from 1.8807/12.
* Dealers said it was difficult to anticipate future zloty moves as the market was shallow and trade extremely choppy.
* Some said foreigners sold small amounts of Polish paper on Monday, but that much of today's currency buying sentiment was driven by speculation. -- Warsaw Newsroom +48 22 653 9700
